reviewText: He was and will always be the greatest country music singer in the world. He has and had an awesome voice that no one on earth could every replace him.. RIP Conway

This was exactly the item I was looking to purchase.  My Aunt Had purchased this tape several years ago and it had finally worn out. She's a really dedicated Conway Twitty fan. My cousin and I had searched every book and video store we could find, to no avail. Just when it appeared that we would not be able to replace this beloved tape for my Aunt, a friend suggested Amazon.com. I was skeptical because I had never used this site before.
  I logged on, entered the specific item I wanted, and almost immediately, there it was. I quickly ordered the tape, entered all necessary information and submitted my order. I received confirmation by e-mail, and in 3 short days the tape was in my mailbox. That was great because my Aunt's birthday was the next weekend!
  Needless to say, I'm still her favorite niece! Thank  you, Amazon.com. I will be a repeat customer, next time checking this site before I waste time checking all the shops in my area.

Sincerely,
Beverly
